title: placements
content: can someone explain the strategy to crack dream tier packages(for cse),will they train u in clg for such interviews if not how should we work to crack them?

comments.body: No college will train, its all based on individual effort. Dream tier packages are any engineering student's dream in this country. You gotta put in a LOT OF effort to achieve those
can u explain how to prepare for them,its not given in the faqs either,do we have to work on dsa ,projects,skills?
what about the gpa cutoff for dream tier,what is it usually?
Cutoff is usually above 9 / 9.5 for dream tier
The same way you'd prepare for any other company, which is already on the FAQs.
wait so is it already ruined for me cuz i scored 7.33 sg in 1st sem?
Bruh no, u have a lot of time still dont worry
Idk man I'm panicking, looking at the cg calculator I gotta pull of 9s every sem to even keep 8.5 and I'm a dropper too, even I have started considering a second drop
